mapper.select: select e.ent_index, ent_name, ent_contact, ent_email, ent_image, ent_ceo, ent_history, ent_address, ent_website, ent_introduce from ent_profile p join enterprise e on p.ent_index = e.ent_index

select e.ent_index, ent_name, ent_contact, ent_email, ent_image, ent_ceo, ent_history, ent_address, ent_website, ent_introduce from ent_profile p join enterprise e on p.ent_index = e.ent_index where e.ent_index = #{index}

select e.ent_index, ent_name, ent_contact, ent_email, ent_image, ent_ceo, ent_history, ent_address, ent_website, ent_introduce from ent_profile p join enterprise e on p.ent_index = e.ent_index where e.ent_name like CONCAT( '%', #{name}, '%')

select e.ent_index, ent_name, ent_contact, ent_email, ent_image, ent_ceo, ent_history, ent_address, ent_website, ent_introduce from ent_profile p join enterprise e on p.ent_index = e.ent_index where ent_introduce like CONCAT( '%', #{word}, '%')

select e.ent_index, ent_name, ent_contact, ent_email, ent_image, ent_ceo, ent_history, ent_address, ent_website, ent_introduce from ent_profile p join enterprise e on p.ent_index = e.ent_index where p.ent_index in (select c.ent_index from classification c join classlist l on c.list_index = l.list_index where l.list_name like CONCAT( '%', #{word}, '%'))
